pitch-wake-text: Friday is always awake and ready to do what you ask.
pitch-fast-text: Friday is implemented on device making it lightning fast
pitch-safe-text: Friday does not send your voice to some server for processing - Your right to privacy is important to us
pitch-adjustable-text: You can teach friday to understand whatever you want!
pitch-reliable-text: As long as the device is not broken - Friday will work, No internet no problem!
pitch-offline-text: Friday does not need to be connected and can be brought anywhere!
